definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U. S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交部对于周二的韩美联合军演表达了关注。

sentences.english: The Korea-U.S. alliance is a precious asset to both countries.
sentences.chinese: 韩美同盟是两国的珍贵资产。

sentences.english: He also disclosed that the delegations of the DPRK and the US held one-on-one talks on the afternoon of July 28.
sentences.chinese: 他还透露，韩美代表团28日下午进行了双边会晤。

sentences.english: The KORUS agreement has yet to receive final approval from U.
sentences.chinese: 韩美协议尚未得到美国国会的最终批准。

sentences.english: North Korea is a buffer between the US forces in South Korea and China.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜是驻韩美军和中国直接的缓冲带。

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U.S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中国外交部对于周二的韩美联合军演表达了关注。

sentences.english: The pact, known as the Korea-U. S. Free Trade Agreement, was signed nearly four-and-a-half years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这份《韩美自由贸易协议》是近四年半前签署的。

sentences.english: Five years passed since I graduated from University and join in Hanmi.
sentences.chinese: 走出校门加入韩美，不知不觉已走过五个年头。

definition: North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
summit talks/discussion between heads of state
Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
THAAD (Terminal High Altitude Area Defense), US Army anti-ballistic missile system
Moon Jae-in (1953-), Korean politician and human rights lawyer, president of Korea from 2017
Mike Pence (1959-), US Republican politician, US vice president from 2017
